name: code-d-code-website
description: Code_d_Code Website Repository - Full-stack club website with backend API
author: Code_d_Code Society

scripts.build:npm: echo 'Building backend...' && cd backend && npm ci && echo 'Backend build complete'
scripts.start: echo 'Starting backend server...' && cd backend && npm start
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint || echo 'No lint script found'
scripts.clean: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.verify: echo 'Verifying project structure...' && ls -la && echo 'Backend directory:' && ls -la backend/
